title: Kira
description: Kira, Mensi Mattha; silk/cotton striped brocade on silk/cotton background; raw silk  a-Single panel of supplementary warp pattern in orange on red groung alternating with plain red stripes; fringe; L 104 in., w. 19-1/2 in.  b-and c-some pattern with blue, red, orange, black stripes along one edge; L. 106 in., W. 17-1/4 in.
